summary: A teenager attends a fantasy writers' convention where he discovers his idea has been stolen by an established novelist.

Richards Jr.|Sam Rockwell|Isaac Russell|Jon Shere|Brian Unger|Edward Osborn|Benji Hughes|Mike White|Cindy Robinson|Chanelle DeVore|Beau Dunn|Kyle Esposito|Heather Kelly|Oriana Reyes
title: Gentlemen Broncos
